label: 鎖繍
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: An embroidery stitch appearing like consecutive loops. Each new stitch starts from within the loop of the previous stitch, binds the loop and forms a new loop. On Shōsō-in textiles, chain stitch is used to create lines. [正倉院]
